c74object.name: fl.read~
c74object.digest: Reads from a buffer~ given an input frame of sample positions.
c74object.description: There are different available interpolation types.

entry.name: 0. /buffer [string]
entry.description: Sets the buffer~ name to use.

entry.name: 1. /chan [int]
entry.description: Sets the buffer~ channel to use.

entry.name: 2. /interp [enum]
entry.description:
Sets the interpolation mode: hermite - cubic hermite interpolation. bspline - cubic bspline interpolation. lagrange - cubic lagrange interpolation. linear - linear interpolation.
[0] - hermite [1] - bspline [2] - lagrange [3] - linear [4] - none

entry.name: 3. /units [enum]
entry.description:
Sets the units for the position input.
[0] - ms [1] - seconds [2] - samples
